home.intro: LyricsRay helps you determine whether a song is appropriate for your child based on its lyrics content. Using advanced AI analysis, we evaluate songs for explicit language, mature themes, and age-appropriate content.

searchForm.intro: Choose to search for a song by title and artist, or paste lyrics directly if you already have them. We will analyze the content and provide you with a detailed assessment and age recommendation.
searchForm.howTo: Search the database or paste any lyrics directly for instant analysis.
searchForm.humanVerification: Complete this quick verification to prevent automated abuse of our AI analysis service.
searchForm.submitAgreeToTerms: By submitting the search request, you agree to our

notes.searchSongTip: Tip: You may submit lyrics in any language!
notes.searchLyricsTip1: Tip #1: Paste the complete lyrics for the most accurate analysis*
notes.searchLyricsTip1Note: Keep in mind that the maximum allowed length of lyrics to analyze is {MAX_CHAR_COUNT} characters. If your lyrics are longer, consider submitting only part of the lyrics.
notes.searchLyricsTip2: Tip #2: You may submit lyrics in any language!
